# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $11,000 for this exclusive item. Should you find this offer appealing, please let me know promptly so we can proceed with the transaction. I look forward to the possibility of serving you. Warm regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
